name: Auras Demo
description:
From "No Frills" Auras, $5 on Unity Asset Store:
https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/integration/no-frills-auras-176456

Controls

  • Mouse click moves to destination. 
  • Select the three Auras by pressing the buttons
    OR
  • by hitting the '1', '2', or '3' key, respectively. 

A showcase of the "No Frills" Aura system in practice.
